meanings.definition: The state or quality of being infectious.
meanings.sent1: The infectiousnesses of the flu made it spread quickly through the school.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the infectiousnesses of viruses to understand how they are transmitted.
meanings.sent3: The infectiousnesses of laughter filled the room as everyone shared jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an infectiousnesses that brightened up the whole office.
meanings.sent5: The infectiousnesses of his enthusiasm for the project inspired the team to work harder.

meanings.definition: The ability to spread or transmit a disease.
meanings.sent1: The high infectiousnesses of COVID-19 led to a global pandemic.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the infectiousnesses of a virus is crucial in controlling its spread.
meanings.sent3: The infectiousnesses of gossip in the office was like a wildfire, spreading quickly.
meanings.sent4: His charisma had an infectiousnesses that drew people to him effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The infectiousnesses of her kindness touched everyone she met.
